## Tender Description

The project involves re-roading, reconstruction of the road structure at Le Goulet, NB. The contract includes furnishing labor, materials, and services necessary for construction. Key activities include:

* Reconstruction of the road structure
* Installation of rip-rap and asphalt
* Installation of shoulder materials
* Drill and blast

## Required Work Schedule

The work must be substantially completed within 15 days after commencement. The asphalt seal and shoulder materials must be installed between July 10 and 31, 2023.
